channel.title: Axocontrol Joystick Bend
channel.description:
Axocontrol board
I'm trying to use Joy-X to send _midi/out/bend._ to midi out. My problem is that I can't get a reliable trigger
I tried joy-X patched as a trigger for _logic/change_ but that doesn't work. Any suggestion on how to use joystick-bend without a stream of superfluous data being sent?

item.title: Axocontrol Joystick Bend
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

see what data the joystick gives in its center and use < and > to ignore changing values when the joystick is centered.
In my case I like to split the stream of the joystick in + and - per axis but hopefully you will get the idea from this screenshot.

Screen Shot 2020-04-08 at 12.29.44 PM.png925x177 21.5 KB

Read full topic
